name: Asimov
description:
Good luck my boy. The words that send little Asimov off on an epic adventure of microscopic proportions.

The last chance for the frail Issac Asimov to recover from an unwitting hospital accident that spawned the Icecream Terror and his legion of viral horrors.

Fight to survive, gain randomised powerups and grow strong enough to take on the Icecream Terror himself in this awesome arcade style adventure across a world of silicon.



Our Team:
  • Damian Karzon
  • Ruslan Idrisov
  • Berin Hunter
  • Chad Edwards
